name: The Living Sands
description:
The Living Sands explores an infinite, procedural desert populated by massive, exotic structures. Perhaps these structures are more than they seem and can be interacted with in some way...

In this prototype the core functionality of the game is produced:

  • character movement
  • vehicle movement (glide with SPACE)
  • basic environments
  • procedural generation (set the seed in the Options menu)
  • menus/scene management (interactivity controls also found in Options menu)
  • audio
  • win conditions

This is my first attempt at making an independent game, so I am well aware there is much more to learn and fix. Hopefully, with time and resources, I can full flesh-out this project.

NOTE: Occasionally the game starts with the player falling through the terrain. Unsure of why this happens, but looking to fix it. For now, just go back to the main menu and retry playing.
